T02D3331:24b-1: khar sa p'a ni s'a dha nam /
T02D3331:24b-3: khar sa p'a ni'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D3331:24b-4: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3331:24b-5: dang po re zhig sngags pas gdan bde ba la nye bar 'dug nas /
T02D3331:24b-6: rang gi snying gar aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D3331:24b-7: de la yi ge hr'i:mdog dkar ba bltas te /
T02D3331:24b-8: de las byung bar gyur pa'i 'od kyis mdun du
T02D3331:24b-9: bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D3331:24b-11: de nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od kyis yang dag par mchod de /
T02D3331:24b-12: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D3331:24b-13: aom sva bh'a wa shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham
T02D3331:24b-14: zhes bya bas bdag nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs
T02D3331:24b-15: par bya ste / sngon du bstan pa'i hr'i:yig las
T02D3331:24b-16: spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rim pas spyan ras gzigs
T02D3331:24b-17: kyi bdag nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3331:24b-18: yan lag thams cad kyi mdog dkar ba /
T02D3331:24b-19: ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D3331:24b-20: 'od dpag med pa dbu la 'ching ba /
T02D3331:24b-21: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa skyil krung phyed pas
T02D3331:24b-22: bzhugs pa phyag g-yas pas mchog sbyin pa g-yon pas
T02D3331:24b-23: padma 'dzin pa / padma dang zla ba'i gdan la gnas pa'o //
T02D3331:24b-24: g-yas kyi logs na sgrol ma dang nor bzangs gnyis so //
T02D3331:24b-25: g-yon pa'i logs na khro gnyer can dang rta mgrin gnyis so //
T02D3331:24b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi bor zla ba la aom /
T02D3331:24b-28: de ltar bsgom pa go bar bya'o //
T02D3331:24b-29: rnal 'byor pa bsam gtan gyis ngal na bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D3331:24b-32: khar sa p'a ni'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so //
T02D3331:24b-33: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang /
